mapper.select: select id id,config_code configCode,config_value configValue,config_type configType,remark remark,insert_time insertTime, update_time updateTime from t_np_config where config_code=#{configCode}
select id id,config_code configCode,config_value configValue,config_type configType,remark remark,insert_time insertTime, update_time updateTime from t_np_config
